rukus.text: Ahale kitabasakalara majata yisakale kupharai karaiche arau musbaraikasakala, sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana nahalaike sihamte birata thakibalai prastuta nachila
Allahara taraphara paraa ejana raachula, yijane tilaraata karai sunaba paraitra patrasamuha
Arau yisakalaka kitaba diya haichila sihamte bibhakta haâ€™la sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana ahara pichata

Arau sihamtaka kerala e'i nirdesa diya haichila ye, sihamte yena allahara ibadata karae te'omra babe'i yena dbinaka ekanistha karae arau yena chalata pratistha karae arau yakata pradana karae, arau e'itorae'i haiche sathika dbina
Niscaya ahale kitabasakalara majara yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamta arau musbaraikasakala jahannamara ju'ita sthayibharae arasthana karaiba; e'omloke'i haiche nikrsta srsti
Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau neka kama karaiche, te'omloke'i haiche srstira sraestha

Te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata te'omlokara puraskara ache sthayi jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata te'omloke cirakala thakiba. Allaha te'omlokara prati santusta arau te'omloke'o te'omra prati santusta. E'ito tara babe, yiye nija pratipalakaka bhaya karae
